# IS_BROWSER

> Check if the runtime is a web browser.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var IS_BROWSER = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-browser' );
```

#### IS_BROWSER

`Boolean` indicating if the runtime is a web browser.

``` javascript
var bool = IS_BROWSER;
// returns <boolean>
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var IS_BROWSER = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-browser' );

console.log( IS_BROWSER );
// => <boolean>
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
